categories: Category:Battles of the Hunt for Zsinj

nodes.text: The Mission to Saffalore was a Wraith Squadron mission in 7 ABY to infiltrate Binring Biomedical Product and gain intelligence about its connection with Warlord Zsinj. Brevet Captain Garik Loran led Wraith Squadron, while Commander Wedge Antilles and Rogue Squadron provided air support. Scientist Edda Gast was captured as a result of this mission.
